game.title: The Forbidden Temple
game.description: In the deepest jungles lies the Forbidden Temple, rumored to hold a powerful artifact. Your quest is to venture into the temple and retrieve the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands.

task.description: Locate the hidden entrance to the Forbidden Temple within the jungle.
Navigate through a series of deadly traps and solve puzzles inside the temple.
Slay the powerful guardian monster that protects the artifact.
